Title: American Steak
Ingredients: 8 pieces Beef Spareribs, cut across bone
1 Cup American Garden BBQ Sauce Original
½ Tsp. American Garden Meat Tenderizer
Instructions: mix in American Garden’s BBQ spice seasoning.
Mix BBQ sauce and meat tenderizer for astonishing taste. Pour over the marinate onto the meat.
let it soak for hours before grilling.

Title: Mac And Cheese
Instructions: Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water for 8 minutes.
Add Cheddar cheese and stir until melted, 2 to 4 minutes.
Drain macaroni and fold into cheese sauce until coated.

Title: Vanilla Milkshake
Instructions: extract together in a blender until smooth
